passive_skill.name: Great Wish
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ excluded) to TEQ Ki Spheres; For every TEQ Ki Sphere obtained: ATK 60% up; 4 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Ki +5; Damage reduction rate 50% up; 4 or more TEQ Ki Spheres obtained: High chance of performing a critical hit; Before attacking: DEF 100% up; As the 1st attacker in a turn: DEF 100% up; As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; Chance of evading enemy's attack 30% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are Extreme Class characters: DEF 60% up; Chance of evading enemy's attack 30% up; Starting from the 7th turn from the start of battle or when there is a "DB Saga", "World Tournament" or "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category enemy: Restores youth using the Dragon Balls' power
